mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROFILE (USER_ID, POSITION, BIO, GITHUB, BLOG, SNS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, LINKEDIN, RESUME) VALUES (#{userId}, #{position}, #{bio}, #{github}, #{blog}, #{sns}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{linkedin}, #{resume})
mapper.update: UPDATE PROFILE SET POSITION = #{position}, BIO = #{bio}, GITHUB = #{github}, BLOG = #{blog}, SNS = #{sns}, LINKEDIN = #{linkedin}, RESUME = #{resume} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
